biotools.summary: spatzie is an R package for identifying significant transcription factor motif co-enrichment from enhancer-promoter interactions. Given a database of DNA sequence motifs representing transcription factors and enhancer promoter interaction data, spatzie performs statistical analysis to identify co-enriched transcription factors.
